games.title: Bee Swarm Simulator
games.description: A 3D multiplayer game where players collect bees, explore vibrant world, and defeat bosses and wawes of enemies in defense ot your base.

games.title: Dungeon Crawler
games.description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler with challenging combat, and deep character progression system.

games.title: Shark Bite
games.description: Fast-paced multiplayer survival game where players either hunt as sharks or survive as humans on various oceanic maps.
